#summary OpenPGM 5 : C Reference : Environment : pgm_shutdown()
#labels Phase-Implementation
#sidebar TOC5CReferenceEnvironment
_Function_
=== Declaration ===
<pre>
#include <pgm/pgm.h>

bool *pgm_shutdown* (void);
</pre>

=== Purpose ===
Shutdown OpenPGM internal machinery.

=== Return Value ===
On success, returns <tt>true</tt>.  On failure, returns <tt>false</tt>.
